1.title: Spell-Shocked Part 1
1.plot: Raven receives a vision of the future but has it wiped from her memory before she can warn the others. The students turn to the Book of Legends for help.

2.title: Spell-Shocked Part 2
2.plot: The girls try to stop the Book of Legends from attacking the school.

3.title: Kid Napped
3.plot: A pair of Shadow Creatures kidnap Robin while Batgirl is babysitting him. Batgirl races to the rescue.

4.title: Bottle Episode
4.plot: Supergirl's cousin Kal entrusts her to look after the bottled city of Kandor for a while.

5.title: Career Day
5.plot: Wonder Woman is selected to shadow the Janitorial Department for Career Day.

6.title: Mood Ring
6.plot: After Star Sapphire's ring breaks, the different moods inside the ring begin infecting the other students of the school.

7.title: Stage Fright
7.plot: After a sudden accident messes up her stage play, Miss Martian must fill in for all the actors.

8.title: Hackgirl
8.plot: Batgirl makes some new modifications to Hawkgirl's mace.

9.title: My New Best Friend
9.plot: Catwoman takes advantage of Batgirl after Batgirl loses her memory.

10.title: Anti-Hall Monitor Part 1
10.plot: Batgirl invents a new phone app that allows the students to avoid Hawkgirl when she's on hall monitor duty.

11.title: Anti-Hall Monitor Part 2
11.plot: The Anti-Hall Monitor Beast has captured all of the students of Super Hero High. All except for Hawkgirl.

12.title: Haunted Harley
12.plot: Bumblebee's suit malfunctions after she steps on Harley's joy buzzer, causing her to remain small. As she tries to get Harley's attention, Harley thinks she's seeing ghosts.

13.title: All Pets Are Off
13.plot: Someone is stealing the pets of Super Hero High. Beast Boy goes undercover to find out who.

14.title: The Wobble
14.plot: Bleez attacks the gymnastics competition after the judges gave her a poor score.

15.title: Rolling Blunder
15.plot: Big Barda joins Wonder Woman and Batgirl's roller derby team as they take on the Furies.

16.title: Target Practice
16.plot: While learning an Earth game, Starfire accidentally sets the Kryptomites free.

17.title: Mindscape
17.plot: Miss Martian and Raven try to wake Bumblebee up from a sleeping spell.

18.title: For The Girl Who Has Everything Part 1
18.plot: Supergirl ideal world becomes a reality.

19.title: For the Girl Who Has Everything Part 2
19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

20.title: Missing Martian
20.plot: Miss Martian eavesdrops on a group of heroes planning something evil.

21.title: Water Water Nowhere
21.plot: After missing the bus for a field trip, Mera discovers Killer Croc trying to break into the school.

22.title: Fortress of Solidarity: Part 1
22.plot: Homesick for the holidays, Supergirl journeys to the North Pole where she runs into Captain Cold.

23.title: Fortress of Solidarity Part 2
23.plot: Reinforcements arrive to help Supergirl before Captain Cold can snatch her special crystal.

24.title: Super Gift Swap
24.plot: The girls take part in the traditional Super Hero High gift exchange.

25.title: My So-Called Anti-Life Part 1
25.plot: Harley decides to take a special math test from Dr. Seid with the rest of the girls. But there is more to the test than they all think.

26.title: My So-Called Anti-Life Part 2
26.plot: Darkseid spreads his power, turning all of the students into copies of himself.

27.title: My So-Called Anti-Life Part 3
27.plot: The remaining survivors attempt to change everyone else back to normal and take down Darkseid for good.

1.title: Welcome to Super Hero High
1.plot: An introduction to Super Hero High and its students.

2.title: All About Super Hero High
2.plot: Bumblebee gives the new transfer student, Wonder Woman, a tour of campus.

3.title: Roomies
3.plot: Wonder Woman settles into her dorm as Harley Quinn, her roommate, tries to get her attention.

4.title: Crazy Quiltin'
4.plot: Wonder Woman begins her first assignment of the semester; designing a super suit.

5.title: Power Outage
5.plot: Wonder Woman begins her next assignment of the semester; flight.

6.title: Fall Into Super Hero High
6.plot: Harley Quinn has organized a movie night, premiering a compilation of footage starring the girls, but what will the others think of it?

7.title: Hero of the Month: Poison Ivy
7.plot: Let's hear it for Our Hero of the Month at Super Hero High: Poison Ivy. Not only has she rescued classmates, friends and strangers, but you'll be amazed at how many sticky situations she's stopped from getting worse.

8.title: Designing Disaster
8.plot: Wonder Woman finally gets a chance to put her self designed super suit to the test, but will she get super results while trying it out?

9.title: Weaponomics
9.plot: Wonder Woman sure knows her weaponomics, but a certain someone doesn't want her teacher to know.

10.title: Clubbing
10.plot: It's time for Poison Ivy to branch out (literally) and join some clubs. Principal's orders. But what club should she choose at Super Hero High School!?

11.title: Hero of the Month: Bumblebee
11.plot: It's Bumblebee's time to shine for her heroic prowess, exceptional flying skills and great taste in music. Follow along as she accepts this exciting honor from Super Hero High School.

12.title: Saving the Day
12.plot: It's the end of the semester for Super Hero High students, but wait. A Save the Day alarm has sounded and they must fly to the rescue.

13.title: Hero of the Month: Wonder Woman
13.plot: Wonder Woman's best known for being a leader and a great friend, which is why Super Hero High nominated her.

1.title: New Beginnings
1.plot: Wonder Woman is living her destiny. As the newly appointed School Ambassador, she's taking the lead to recruit Supergirl to Super Hero High - until a sneak attack from villainess Giganta catches her off guard.

2.title: Hero of the Month: Supergirl
2.plot:

3.title: Batgirl vs. Supergirl
3.plot: Batgirl and Supergirl race each other to the cafeteria to get the last piece of cake.

4.title: Quinn-tessential Harley
4.plot: Harley Quinn's video blog has gone viral! Can she handle the responsibility of being a Super Hero AND a celebrity?

5.title: Hero of the Month: Harley Quinn
5.plot: TA-DA. Hero of the Month is Harley Quinn. She saves the day in crazy fun ways and laughs in the face of danger.

6.title: License to Fly
6.plot: The Batjet is ready for lift-off. But first, Batgirl must maneuver her way through the Flyer's Ed test. Find out if she has the skills to ace the exam.

7.title: Hero of the Month: Batgirl

9.title: Franken-Ivy
9.plot: Ivy's new pet plant becomes overprotective and out of hand.

10.title: Hero of the Month: Katana

11.title: Dude, Where's My Invisible Jet?
11.plot: The girls help Wonder Woman find her "misplaced" invisible jet.

12.title: Hero of the Month: Frost
12.plot:

13.title: The Blunder Games
13.plot: Batgirl tries to survive in the wild using her trusty bat-gadgets.

14.title: Hawkgirl's Day Off
14.plot: As a reward for all of her hard work, the girls try to give Hawkgirl a day to relax.

15.title: Hero of the Month: Hawkgirl
15.plot:

16.title: The Cheetah Who Cried Wolf
16.plot: Cheetah tries to stage a crime in order to win Superhero of the Month.

17.title: Ring of Mire
17.plot: Star Sapphire must brave the sewers as she searches for her lantern ring.

18.plot:

22.title: Roomies Return: Frost's Bite
22.plot: Frost tries to find a way to get warm.

23.title: The Odd Couple
23.plot: Harley and Lady Shiva are assigned to track down and capture Cheshire.

24.title: Cold Blooded
24.plot: The girls try to help Frost get over a cold.

25.title: Hero of the Month: Lady Shiva

1.title: Batnapped
1.plot: Batgirl is kidnapped by Killer Moth and it is up to Supergirl to rescue her.

2.title: Surprise!
2.plot: Harley, Bumblebee, and Katana try to sneak past Batgirl's security system to drop off a gift in her room.

3.title: Tales from the Kryptomites Part 1
3.plot: The girls find Lena to inform her of some bad news. They are unaware of her weird experiment with kryptonite.

4.title: Tales from the Kryptomites Part 2
4.plot: The students of Super Hero High try to stop a swarm of little Kryptomites from taking over the city.

5.title: Seeing Red
5.plot: Starfire finds it peculiar that the rest of the staff and students at Super Hero High are suddenly down each other's throats.

6.title: Spring Prison Break
6.plot: Frost and Katana are assigned to stop Lashina from breaking the Furies out of prison.

7.title: Around Metropolis in 80 Seconds
7.plot: Wonder Woman, Supergirl, and Harley Quinn race each other around Metropolis.

8.title: For Art's Sake
8.plot: Katana tries to stop the Double Dare Twins from stealing a painting from the school's Art Show.

9.title: Wildside Part 1
9.plot: Batgirl, Starfire, and Beast Boy are enjoying a picnic when Lion-Mane suddenly releases all of the animals, from a nearby zoo, and they go on a rampage around the park.

10.title: Wildside Part 2
10.plot: Beast Boy, Batgirl, and Starfire round up all of the animals and put them back in their cages with the assistance of zoo volunteer, Mari McCabe.

11.title: Day of Fun-Ship
11.plot: Starfire tries to show her older sister, Blackfire, a good time on her visit to Earth.

12.title: The Ares Up There
12.plot: Ares crashes a party on Paradise Island.

13.title: Stealth 101 Part 1
13.plot: Batgirl and Poison Ivy are paired together to try and create stealth suits for class.

14.title: Stealth 101 Part 2
14.plot: Batgirl and Poison Ivy try to rescue Crazy Quilt from Killer Moth.

15.title: A Fury Scorned
15.plot: Lashina poisons Commissioner Gordon in order to distract Batgirl and Hawkgirl from stopping her while she frees the Furies from prison.

16.title: Body Electric
16.plot: A vicious battle with Giganta causes a power outage around the city.

17.title: Techless Tuesday
17.plot: Mrs. Clayface steals Batgirl's gadgets, leaving Batgirl to use her mind, physical abilities, and surroundings to take them all back.

18.title: Fresh Ares Part 1
18.plot: Catwoman plans to steal the Amulet of Harmonia from Ares.

19.title: Fresh Ares Part 2
19.plot: Ares goes on a rampage around the city and it is up to the students of Super Hero High to stop him.

20.title: Fresh Ares Part 3
20.plot: Wonder Woman and Supergirl distract Ares while Batgirl and company try to get the Amulet back from Catwoman.

21.title: Gorilla Warfare
21.plot: Gorilla Grodd's old unit from Gorilla City breaks into the school to try and rescue their leader from "captivity".

22.title: Fight Flub
22.plot: Coach Wildcat pairs Katana up with Big Barda so she can teach her marshal arts.

23.title: Jetsetters
23.plot: Wonder Woman teaches Frost how to fly her invisible jet when they suddenly come under attack by Killer Moth.

24.title: A New Perry-Spective
24.plot: Batgirl, Lady Shiva, and Big Barda answer a distress call about a new threat that is attacking the city.

25.title: Dog Day After School
25.plot: A mysterious Kryptonian seems to be attacking the city and Supergirl believes that she is the only one that can stop it.

26.title: It's A Superful Life
26.plot: The students of Super Hero High decide to give a little more this holiday season.

1.title: Ring Me Maybe Part 1
1.plot: The group throws a going away party for Green Lantern as he decides to leave Earth to train at the Green Lantern Corp.

2.title: Ring Me Maybe Part 2
2.plot: Sinestro kidnaps the supers of Super Hero High.

3.title: Ring Me Maybe Part 3
3.plot: A Green Lantern Ring has chosen Jessica Cruz as its champion. But she is reluctant to take it.

4.title: Ring Me Maybe Part 4
4.plot: Jessica faces her fears as she takes on Sinestro.

5.title: Fish Out of Water Part 1
5.plot: Mera has a rough first day at Super Hero High.

6.title: Fish Out of Water Part 2
6.plot: Mera tries to save Miss Martian from Firefly.

7.title: Gone to the Dogs Part 1
7.plot: Krypto tries to befriend Batgirl's new dog, Ace, who would much rather be doing work than play.

8.title: Gone to the Dogs Part 2
8.plot: Krypto and Ace chase after Catwoman's cat, Roz, to recover the jewels that she stole.

9.title: Pets Peeved Part 1
9.plot: Even though pets are now allowed at Super Hero High, several of them have a hard time understanding teamwork.

10.title: Pets Peeved Part 2
10.plot: The pets of Super Hero High work together to rescue their masters.

11.title: Ha-Ha Horticulture
11.plot: Ivy's new experiment accidentally causes everyone at Super Hero High to fall asleep.

12.title: Truth of the Lasso Part 1
12.plot: Cheetah tries to steal Wonder Woman's Lasso of Truth.

13.title: Truth of the Lasso Part 2
13.plot: Wonder Woman thinks back to the day when she first got the Lasso.

14.title: Truth of the Lasso Part 3
14.plot: The group goes on a field trip when Giganta starts attacking the city.

15.title: Truth of the Lasso Part 4
15.plot: Cheetah uses the Lasso of Truth on Wonder Woman to try and make her confess something humiliating.

16.title: Nevermore Part 1
16.plot: Trigon tries to teach his daughter, Raven, magic spells. Unknowingly their lesson is disrupting Metropolis, above.

17.title: Nevermore Part 2
17.plot: Supergirl shows Raven what it means to be a hero.

19.title: Nevermore Part 4
19.plot: Raven, Supergirl, and Batgirl work together to stop Trigon from destroying Super Hero High.

20.title: Drive Me Crazy
20.plot: The students try to teach Big Barda how to drive.

21.title: Tamaranean Dance Club Part 1
21.plot: When Starfire gets homesick, the girls decide to throw a dance party to cheer her up.

22.title: Tamaranean Dance Club Part 2
22.plot: The girls realize that a Tamaranean dance is not what they expected it to be.

23.title: Fly By Night
23.plot: It's past curfew but Wonder Woman and Bumblebee sneak through the hallways to recover their school project from the cafeteria.

24.title: By the Yearbook
24.plot: Wonder Woman and Harley work together on the Super Hero High Yearbook. However, they both have different opinions on what to put in.

imdb.plot outline: At Super Hero High, iconic Super Heroes like Wonder Woman, Supergirl, Batgirl, Harley Quinn, Bumblebee, Poison Ivy, and Katana navigate all the twists and turns of high school. United by friendship, the DC Super Hero Girls empower kids to shine with confidence and courage, especially while they combat those overwhelming, exciting, and awesomely awkward moments of growing up.
imdb.title: DC Super Hero Girls
plot: At Super Hero High, iconic Super Heroes like Wonder Woman, Supergirl, Batgirl, Harley Quinn, Bumblebee, Poison Ivy, and Katana navigate all the twists and turns of high school. United by friendship, the _DC Super Hero Girls_ (qv) empower kids to shine with confidence and courage, especially while they combat those overwhelming, exciting, and awesomely awkward moments of growing up.
